title: 273 Pixley Street
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner applied for removal permit (785524); tree is diseased and dead, has no leaves and hasn't bloomed for the past 18 months; will be replaced

title: 2362 Vallejo Street
Reason(s) for removal: In poor condition, fruiting bodies on trunk, decay, BUF previously notified property owner to remove and replace tree, now tree is not stable; will be replaced

title: 4210 Ocean Avenue
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner applied for removal permit (785453); ramp design to become compliant with ADA violation notice is within footprint of trees on Ocean Avenue entrance. Project redesigned in attempt to save trees but could not meet compliance without placing in footprint, trees on Everglade Drive frontage were saved; three new trees will be planted on Everglade frontage where existing gaps in plantings exist.

title: 439 Hill Street
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner applied for removal permit (785281); tree is blocking sidewalk and parking lane and needs to be removed for the construction of a new driveway, not an ideal street tree due to low branch canopy; will be replaced by property owner

title: 1975 - 2399 Market Street
Reason(s) for removal:
Removals and replacements all part of construction contract for the Upper Marker Street Safety Project led by the SFMTA (https://www.sfmta.com/projects/upper-market-street-safety-project); all trees will be replaced by project.
Click on this PDF for details.
For more information contact Steven Keller: stephen.keller@sfdpw.org, (628) 271-2814

title: 50 Elsie Street
Reason(s) for removal: Several neighbors on block requested removal of tree, ficus causing significant sidewalk damage and has poor upper canopy structure; will be replaced in same location
